content: + **free** video tutorial 1 difficulty level easy terminology american crochet terminology approximate size 35 cm x 9 cm measured flat 13 75 in x 3 25 in materials needed yarn weight 4 e g alize superlana midi yardage 140m - 150m 150 yds - 165 yds double-stranded weight 2 e g schachenmayr baby smiles bravo baby 185 yardage 310m - 330m 340 yds - 360 yds hook 5 mm crochet hook scissors needle for weaving in ends abbreviations & stitches used chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet blo - back loop only flo - front loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch st / sts - stitch / stitches special techniques - half_double_crochet ribbing working half_double_crochet in the blo except for the first and last stitch of each row which are worked through both loops - working into the 3rd loop bump of the starting chain 1 https //youtu be/gaqjkvzjq10
